title: #105 Danny & Jackie Schimmel (Host of The Bitch Bible) Talk Bravo/Nancy Meyers & More!
itunes:title: #105 Danny & Jackie Schimmel (Host of The Bitch Bible) Talk Bravo/Nancy Meyers & More!
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Jackie Schimmel (host of The Bitch Bible) to talk all things pop culture. They discuss the current seasons of #RHOA & #RHONJ, Nancy Meyers movies, Jude Law, Jessica Simpson, Britney Spears, and SO much more. Danny also talks about th...
description:
Danny welcomes Jackie Schimmel (host of The Bitch Bible) to talk all things pop culture. They discuss the current seasons of #RHOA & #RHONJ, Nancy Meyers movies, Jude Law, Jessica Simpson, Britney Spears, and SO much more. Danny also talks about the FYRE festival documentaries, #RHONY, and more.


Jackie Schimmel: 10:05ish


*To support this podcast & for bonus eps, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:
